XI Festival of Literature and Theatre: Kosmopolis 2020
In 2020 I made the website for the experimental online edition of the bilingual Festival of Literature and Theatre: Between.Pomiędzy.
It was an extraordinary project in the unusual situation of the world coronavirus epidemic.
I used the front-end technologies and tools, such as: HTML5, SCSS, JavaScript, React, Git, GitHub, VSCode. I was also UX and UI designer of this website.

Research Institute of Armenian Studies
In 2019 I made the website of the academic association 'Research Institute of Armenian Studies' (originally: 'Instytut Badań Ormiańskich').
In the first version I had created this project by CMS wix in 2018. It was a part of my professional activity at that time.
In the new version I used the basic front-end technologies and tools, such as: HTML5, SCSS, JavaScript, Git, GitHub, VSCode. I was also UX and UI designer of this website.

Research Institute for European Policy

In 2019 I made the website of the academic association 'Research Institute for European Policy' (originally: 'Instytut Badań nad Polityką Europejską'). It was may first website made by front-end technologies.
At the beginning, in 2015 I had created this project by CMS of home.pl, and recreated on CMS wix in 2016. It was a part of my professional activity at that time.
In the new version I used the basic front-end technologies and tools, such as: HTML5, SCSS, jQuery, Git, GitHub, VSCode. I was also UX and UI designer of this website.
